code: import _objectSpread from"/workspaces/Github-Finder-App/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{SEARCH_USERS,SET_LOADING,CLEAR_USERS,GET_USER,GET_REPOS}from'../types';var githubReducer=function githubReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case SEARCH_USERS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{users:action.payload,loading:false});case GET_USER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{user:action.payload,loading:false});case CLEAR_USERS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{users:[],loading:false});case GET_REPOS:{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{repos:action.payload,loading:false});}case SET_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});default:return state;}};export default githubReducer;
